queries.query_text: What is the rule about CHAPTER 5: FEATS?
queries.query_text_short: What is the rule about CHAPTER 5: FEATS?

queries.query_text: What is the rule about All kinds of experiences and training can shape your character beyond what you learn by advancing in  your class. Abilities that require a degree of training but can be learned by anyone—not only members  of certain ancestries or classes—are called general feats.?
queries.query_text_short: What is the rule about All kinds of experiences and training can shape your character beyond what you l?

queries.query_text: What is the rule about For most classes, you gain a general feat when you reach  3rd level and every 4 levels thereafter. Each time you gain  a general feat, you can select any feat with the general  trait whose prerequisites you satisfy.?
queries.query_text_short: What is the rule about For most classes, you gain a general feat when you reach  3rd level and every 4 ?

queries.query_text: What is the rule about General feats also include a subcategory of skill feats,  which expand on what you can accomplish via skills.  These feats also have the skill trait. Most characters gain  skill feats at 2nd level and every 2 levels thereafter. When?
queries.query_text_short: What is the rule about General feats also include a subcategory of skill feats,  which expand on what y?

queries.query_text: What is the rule about you gain a skill feat, you must select a general feat with  the skill trait; you can't select a general feat that lacks the  skill trait. The level of a skill feat is typically the minimum  level at which a character could meet its proficiency  prerequisite.?
queries.query_text_short: What is the rule about you gain a skill feat, you must select a general feat with  the skill trait; you?

queries.query_text: What is the rule about In addition to the skill feats specifically associated with  each skill, there are some that can be taken with various  skills or even all skills, like Assurance.?
queries.query_text_short: What is the rule about In addition to the skill feats specifically associated with  each skill, there a?

queries.query_text: What is the rule about **GENERAL FEATS**?
queries.query_text_short: What is the rule about **GENERAL FEATS**?
